name: IMD4006 - First Game
description: The objective of the game is to fight off approaching enemies using a special weapon. Holding down 'X', the player is able to spin the weapon around. Upon release of 'X', the weapon will be released in the trajectory predetermined by the player's timing. Pressing 'X' again will move the player to the location of the weapon, enabling the player to move around the battlefield. The player must hit all enemies using their weapon to win the game.
